dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Intron 2 of LDHB gene
dryad:DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Contains DNA sequences for 100 phased and aligned alleles from intron 2 of LDHB gene sampled from gadwalls (Anas strepera). The first 50 alleles were sampled from Eurasia, and the second set of 50 alleles were sampled from North America. The sequences were aligned in Sequencher.
